name: IpfilterX-u23 Tools
short_description: Two tools able to edit your ipfilter.dat . These tools are able to edit your ipfilter.dat in order to check for big ranges and to check adjacent ranges . From the creators of ipfilterX , Nexus23 Labs . - Updates in Progress -
